welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Locate di Triulzi, a charming town known for its ancient history and delicious cuisine. We invite you to immerse yourself in our beautiful city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost airlines for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 2 hours. After that, they can purchase additional time or access the premium WiFi service.
